General.Name: Samil Co.Ltd
General.Description: Samil Co.,Ltd., a logistics company, engages in the terminal business in South Korea. It offers storage, steel transportation, warehousing, unloading, cargo handling, and terminal fueling services, as well as digital logistics systems. The company was formerly known as Samil Transportation Limited Partnership and changed its name to Samil Co.,Ltd. in 1984. Samil Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Pohang, South Korea.
